items.summary: Update the homepage (frontend/src/App.tsx) so it displays exactly one photo (the main couple photo area with the existing file picker/preview) and remove the secondary/static photo element currently rendered alongside it.

Update the success popup modal (frontend/src/components/ValentineModal.tsx) so its default image uses the other static photo (the one removed from the homepage), and ensure that photo is only shown in the modal after the user clicks “Yes”. Keep the existing modal image picker/preview behavior intact.
